description: I’m the assistant TV editor at The Times. Here are five things I’ve been watching, reading and listening to lately.
title: What’s in Our Queue? Tim Robinson and More
title_page: What’s in Our Queue? Tim Robinson and More - The New York Times
maintext:
What’s in Our Queue? Tim Robinson and More
Lara Solanki/Netflix
I’m the assistant TV editor at The Times.
I’ve spent the pandemic tearing apart and rebuilding my motorcycle and my first novel. I’ve watched, read and listened to plenty of things, too.
Here are five favorites →
